#include<iostream>
 
#define max 3200
using namespace std;
 
inline int scanInt() {
      register int retInt = 0,d;
      while ((d = getchar()) >= '0') {
            retInt = (retInt<<3) + (retInt<<1) + (d-'0');
      }
      return retInt;
}
 
int main()
{
    int arr[max],tc,i,j,n,flag;
    for(i=1;i<max;i++)
        arr[i]=i*i;
        
    tc=scanInt();
    while(tc--)
    {
        flag=0;
        n=scanInt();
        i=1;
        j=max-1;
        while(i<=j)
        {
            if(arr[i]+arr[j]==n)
            {
                flag=1;
                break;
            }
            else if(arr[i]+arr[j]>n)
            {
                j--; 
            }
            else if(arr[i]+arr[j]<n)
            {
                i++; 
            }
        }
        if(flag)
            cout<<"YES\n";
        else
            cout<<"NO\n";
    }
 
    return 0;
}
